additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 2.67 armor, 32 attack speed, 10% movement speed, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen and 16% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 2.67 armor, 32 attack speed, 10% movement speed, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 16% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 2.67 armor, 32 attack speed, 10% movement speed, 192 mana, 0.8 mana regen, 16% spell damage and 16 attack damage.
name: Yasha and Kaya
description: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.
